version_description:
Bug fixes and performance updates!

Two new features:
• Recolor your images
• Paint areas in the image that you want to turn into grayscale

Thanks for all your feedback and ideas! If you’re not happy with the app or you think something is missing, then please e-mail us at: depello@btown.se

General bug fixes and performance improvements.
Thanks for all your feedback. We hope you will enjoy this new version.
If you have any ideas for improvements or other feedback then write us at: depello@btown.se

General bug fixes and performance improvements.
Thanks for all your feedback. We hope you will enjoy this new version.

* Added iOS12 and iPhone X support!
* Improved image processing speed and app performance in general.
* New icon!
* Big UX rework!

* Added iOS12 and iPhone X support!
* Improved image processing speed and app performance in general.
* New icon!
* Big UX rework!

Thanks for all your feedback.
This helps me to constantly improve Depello and make it the best recolor app in the AppStore :-D

News in this version:
* Fixed issue that some images turned black after saving!
* Improved stability
* Performance upgrade by using the latest 3d shading technology

Thanks for all your feedback.
This helps us to constantly improve Depello and make it the best recolor app on the AppStore :-D

News in this version:
* Improved stability
* Performance upgrade by switching to MetalKit - state of the art graphics rendering framework

News in this version:
* Improved stability
* Performance upgrade by switching to MetalKit - state of the art graphics rendering framework
* Fixed issue where some photos could not be loaded from Camera roll

Thanks for all your feedback.
This helps us to constantly improve Depello and make it the best recolor app on the AppStore :-D
